languages.text: "Сколько я его помню, Ан всегда был мыслителем, мечтателем даже. Откапывал какие-то древние книги, изучал модели общества. Грезил идеалами. Иные отцы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g} сказали бы, что не считать общество {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} идеальным — уже ересь, но... я верю, что Ан хотел как лучше. Знать бы еще, куда его завела эта дорога..."

traits.locale_text: "Сколько я его помню, Ан всегда был мыслителем, мечтателем даже. Откапывал какие-то древние книги, изучал модели общества. Грезил идеалами. Иные отцы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g} сказали бы, что не считать общество {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} идеальным — уже ересь, но... я верю, что Ан хотел как лучше. Знать бы еще, куда его завела эта дорога..."

languages.text: "For as long as I have known him, An has always been a thinker, a dreamer, even. He would dig up these ancient books, studying societal models and theories. He was obsessed with ideals. There are priests within the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} who would call it heresy to view the society of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as anything but perfect, however... I believe that An only wanted what he thought was best. I only wish I knew where that road had taken him..."
languages.original_text: "Сколько я его помню, Ан всегда был мыслителем, мечтателем даже. Откапывал какие-то древние книги, изучал модели общества. Грезил идеалами. Иные отцы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g} сказали бы, что не считать общество {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} идеальным — уже ересь, но... я верю, что Ан хотел как лучше. Знать бы еще, куда его завела эта дорога..."

There are priests within the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} who would call it heresy to view the society of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as anything but perfect, however... I believe that An only wanted what he thought was best. I wish I knew where that road has taken him..."

There are priests within the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} who would call it heresy to view the society of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as anything but perfect, however... I believe that An only wanted what he thought was best. I only wish I knew where that road had taken him..."

languages.text: «Durante todo el tiempo que lo conozco, An siempre ha sido un pensador, un soñador incluso. Desenterraba libros antiguos, estudiaba modelos y teorías de la sociedad. Estaba obsesionado con los ideales. Hay sacerdotes dentro de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g} que considerarían herejía ver a la sociedad del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} como algo imperfecto, sin embargo... creo que An solo quería lo que él consideraba que era lo mejor. Desearía haber visto adónde le conducía ese camino antes...».
languages.original_text: "For as long as I have known him, An has always been a thinker, a dreamer, even. He would dig up these ancient books, studying societal models and theories. He was obsessed with ideals. There are priests within the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} who would call it heresy to view the society of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as anything but perfect, however... I believe that An only wanted what he thought was best. I only wish I knew where that road had taken him..."

traits.locale_text: «Durante todo el tiempo que lo conozco, An siempre ha sido un pensador, un soñador incluso. Desenterraba libros antiguos, estudiaba modelos y teorías de la sociedad. Estaba obsesionado con los ideales. Hay sacerdotes dentro de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g} que considerarían herejía ver a la sociedad del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} como algo imperfecto, sin embargo... creo que An solo quería lo que él consideraba que era lo mejor. Desearía haber visto adónde le conducía ese camino antes...».

languages.text: "So lange ich ihn kenne, war An immer ein Denker. Ein Träumer gar. Er hat sogar uralte Bücher ausgegraben, um gesellschaftliche Modelle und Theorien zu studieren. Er war besessen von Idealen. Es gibt Priester innerhalb der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g}, die es Ketzerei nennen würden, die Gesellschaft des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} nicht als perfekt anzusehen, doch ... Ich glaube, dass An nur wollte, was er für das Beste hielt. Ich wünschte nur, ich hätte gewusst, wohin dieser Weg ihn geführt hat ..."
languages.original_text: "For as long as I have known him, An has always been a thinker, a dreamer, even. He would dig up these ancient books, studying societal models and theories. He was obsessed with ideals. There are priests within the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} who would call it heresy to view the society of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as anything but perfect, however... I believe that An only wanted what he thought was best. I only wish I knew where that road had taken him..."

traits.locale_text: "So lange ich ihn kenne, war An immer ein Denker. Ein Träumer gar. Er hat sogar uralte Bücher ausgegraben, um gesellschaftliche Modelle und Theorien zu studieren. Er war besessen von Idealen. Es gibt Priester innerhalb der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g}, die es Ketzerei nennen würden, die Gesellschaft des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} nicht als perfekt anzusehen, doch ... Ich glaube, dass An nur wollte, was er für das Beste hielt. Ich wünschte nur, ich hätte gewusst, wohin dieser Weg ihn geführt hat ..."

languages.text: « An a toujours été un penseur, pour ne pas dire un rêveur. Il passait son temps à déterrer des livres anciens, à étudier des modèles de société et des théories... Il était obnubilé par les idéaux. Mais certains prêtres de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g} n'hésiteraient pas à qualifier d'hérésie la moindre suggestion d'un défaut au sein de la société de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}... Pour moi, An cherchait simplement à agir au mieux. J'aurais simplement aimé savoir où cette voie l'a mené... »
languages.original_text: "For as long as I have known him, An has always been a thinker, a dreamer, even. He would dig up these ancient books, studying societal models and theories. He was obsessed with ideals. There are priests within the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} who would call it heresy to view the society of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as anything but perfect, however... I believe that An only wanted what he thought was best. I only wish I knew where that road had taken him..."

traits.locale_text: « An a toujours été un penseur, pour ne pas dire un rêveur. Il passait son temps à déterrer des livres anciens, à étudier des modèles de société et des théories... Il était obnubilé par les idéaux. Mais certains prêtres de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g} n'hésiteraient pas à qualifier d'hérésie la moindre suggestion d'un défaut au sein de la société de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}... Pour moi, An cherchait simplement à agir au mieux. J'aurais simplement aimé savoir où cette voie l'a mené... »

languages.text: “我已经认识他这么多年了，他一直是个思想家，甚至可以说是梦想家。他时常钻研古代著作，学习社会模型与理论，痴迷于各种理念。他认为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的社会体制并不完美。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}牧师可能会将这种想法斥为异端邪说，但是……我相信，安只是在追寻他心目中最理想的社会。我只希望能看到他追求的结果……”
languages.original_text: "For as long as I have known him, An has always been a thinker, a dreamer, even. He would dig up these ancient books, studying societal models and theories. He was obsessed with ideals. There are priests within the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} who would call it heresy to view the society of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as anything but perfect, however... I believe that An only wanted what he thought was best. I only wish I knew where that road had taken him..."

traits.locale_text: “我已经认识他这么多年了，他一直是个思想家，甚至可以说是梦想家。他时常钻研古代著作，学习社会模型与理论，痴迷于各种理念。他认为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的社会体制并不完美。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}牧师可能会将这种想法斥为异端邪说，但是……我相信，安只是在追寻他心目中最理想的社会。我只希望能看到他追求的结果……”

languages.text: 「俺の知る限り、アンは思想家で、夢想家ですらあった。彼は古代の本を読み漁り、社会モデルや理論を研究していた。理想に取り憑かれていたんだ。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}の中には、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}社会に少しでも疑問を持つ者を異端者と呼ぶ司祭もいるが…アンは己が最善だと思うことを望んだだけだと俺は信じている。その道が彼をどこへ導いたのか、知ることができればよかったんだが…」
languages.original_text: "For as long as I have known him, An has always been a thinker, a dreamer, even. He would dig up these ancient books, studying societal models and theories. He was obsessed with ideals. There are priests within the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} who would call it heresy to view the society of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as anything but perfect, however... I believe that An only wanted what he thought was best. I only wish I knew where that road had taken him..."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の中のアンはいつも、よく物事を考えて、夢を描くような人だった。古代の本を読み漁って、社会モデルや理論を研究していたものさ。理想に取り憑かれていたんだ。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}の中には、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の仕組みに少しでも疑問を持つ者を異端と呼ぶ司祭もいるけど…アンは自分が一番良いと思うことだけ求めていたと思うんだ。その道の先に、アンがどうなるか知ることができていたら…」

「俺の知る限り、アンは思想家で、夢想家ですらあった。彼は古代の本を読み漁り、社会モデルや理論を研究していた。理想に取り憑かれていたんだ。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}の中には、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}社会に少しでも疑問を持つ者を異端者と呼ぶ司祭もいるが…アンは己が最善だと思うことを望んだだけだと俺は信じている。その道が彼をどこへ導いたのか、知ることができればよかったんだが…」

languages.text: "An, onu tanıdığım ilk günden beri daima bir düşünür, hatta bir hayalperest olmuştur. Kadim kitapları karıştırır, toplumsal modeller ve teoriler üzerinde çalışırdı. İdeallere takıntılıydı. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi{/g} içinde {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} toplumunu mükemmellikten uzak görmeyi kâfirlikle eş tutan rahipler var ancak... An'in sadece en doğrusu olduğunu düşündüğü şeyi istediğine inanıyorum. Keşke bu yolun onu nereye götürdüğünü bilseydim."
languages.original_text: "For as long as I have known him, An has always been a thinker, a dreamer, even. He would dig up these ancient books, studying societal models and theories. He was obsessed with ideals. There are priests within the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} who would call it heresy to view the society of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as anything but perfect, however... I believe that An only wanted what he thought was best. I only wish I knew where that road had taken him..."

An'in sadece en doğrusu olduğunu düşündüğü şeyi istediğine inanıyorum. Keşke bu yolun onu nereye götürdüğünü bilseydim."
